doc.previous: Variably rhotic accents in which speakers often sporadically waver between rhoticity and non rhoticity without any particular rules of context are also widely documented Variably rhotic accents include much of Caribbean English for example as spoken in Tobago Guyana Antigua and Barbuda and the Bahamas 12
